item.title: How do I block all the Twitter advertisers I've seen?
item.description: Requirements For following this Guide you need the following: a Twitter Developer Account your Twitter Data Archive the programm python3 and pip3 Program Setup Let’s start by getting the Program set up. First, we need to install the requirements by running pip3 install -r requirements.txt --user After that you need to copy the .env.example file to .env Now you need to get your Twitter Developer Credential and fill them in the .
